infos.value: Back down. You're no match for the likes of him.
But...sometimes a man's got to do what a man's got to do!
Wh-whoa... Are you going to fight with me?
You haven't...fallen for me, have you? You have? You have, haven't you?
I'm touched...but... Mach√©rie is waiting for me, you see?
How about we just be friends?
W-would you please just shut your mouth? Any more of your nonsense and I may side with Lord Sterne instead.
I get it. Too much talking ruins the moment. Yet are you sure about this?
I am simply following the path I believe to be right. Lord Sterne...forgive me.
As I said, I have abandoned Leonis.
